feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.6: Add New Maintenance Mode
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release add the ability to turn on maintenance mode for the application.

Documentation has been added here.

:rocket: Features

  • Add ability to set maintenance mode (#2476) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.202.0 to 3.202.1 (#2473) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump thor from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 (#2472) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.968.0 to 1.969.0 (#2470) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump highline from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 (#2469) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.14 to 0.4.15 (#2468) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.201.5 to 3.202.0 (#2467) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-env from 2.1.1 to 2.2.0 (#2466) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.25.1 to 2.26.0 (#2464) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 (#2463) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.45.6

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.8: Updated Doc Links, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Documentation & Links Cleanup (#2528) @pglombardo
  • Add Overcommit for local development (#2529) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.205.0 to 3.206.0 (#2527) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sigv4 from 1.9.1 to 1.10.0 (#2526) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.9: Public Gateway Bug Fix, Language Strings & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix Push Expiration bug with Public Gateway (#2546) Thanks @Viajaz!

:rocket: Features

  • Fix Workers Count: Set default count of 2 (#2545) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language Strings (#2530) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0 (#2543) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.163.0 to 1.164.0 (#2542) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.91.0 to 1.92.0 (#2541) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.26.1 to 2.26.2 (#2540) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.206.0 to 3.207.0 (#2539) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump faraday from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 (#2538) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.9 to 2.0.10 (#2537) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump puma from 6.4.2 to 6.4.3 (#2536) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.7 to 2.0.9 (#2534) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.162.0 to 1.163.0 (#2533) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.976.0 to 1.977.0 (#2532) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.10: Better TestMailer with checks for local mail servers
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Better TestMailer with checks for local mail server. (#2554) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump webrick from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 (#2552) @dependabot
